description: Provides the details of a resource policy attached to a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that is associated with the resource policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a revision of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicy
nested_items.description: The resource policy in a JSON-formatted string.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the resource policy was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the resource policy was last modified.
